# set up -----------------------------

library(RPostgreSQL)
source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")
#

# library(devtools)
 # remotes::install_github("catalystcalifornia/rdaCharts")
library(rdaCharts)
# library(stringr)
library(htmltools) 
# library(htmlwidgets)
# remotes::install_github("jthomasmock/gtExtras")
library(gtExtras)
library(gt)
library(extrafont)
library(usethis)

#connect to postgres

source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")

con <- connect_to_db("eci_fresno_ripa")

# pull and clean analysis tables for visualizing ----

df_p<-dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM report_traffic_detained")

# filter groups being visualized and select rate and counts to be visualized
df<-df_p%>%filter(race %in% c("nh_white","latinx","nh_asian","nh_aian","nh_nhpi","nh_multiracial","nh_black","nh_sswana"))%>%
  select(race,gender,detained_count,detained_total,detained_total_rate)%>%
  arrange(-detained_total_rate)%>%
  filter(detained_total_rate>0)%>%
  mutate(detained_total_rate=detained_total_rate*100)

# create race label
df<-df%>%mutate(race_label = case_when(
    race == 'latinx' ~ "Latinx", 
    race =='nh_white' ~ 'White',
    race =='nh_black' ~ 'Black',
    race == 'nh_asian' ~ 'Asian',
   race == 'nh_multiracial' ~ 'Multiracial',
    race == 'nh_aian' ~ 'AIAN',
    race == 'nh_nhpi' ~ 'NHPI',
    race == 'nh_sswana' ~ 'SWANA/SA', 
    TRUE ~ as.character(race)),
   label=paste0(race_label," ",gender))

# visualize--------------------------

# create caption 

sourcenote<-"Catalyst California calculations based on City of Fresno's Police Stop Data (2022), catalystcalifornia.org, 2024. "

methodnote <- "Analysis for all officer-initiated traffic stops that included an officer detaining a person in 2022. Genders are based on cisgender identification by officers."

racenote <- "Race/ethnicity: SWANA/SA=Southwest Asian (Middle Eastern) or North African, or South Asian."

caption_text <- paste("<br>", sourcenote, methodnote,racenote)


# create tooltip text

tooltip_text <- "Fresno PD detained {point.detained_total} people during officer-initiated traffic stops. <b>{point.detained_total_rate:.1f}%</b> of these people were perceived as <b>{point.label}s</b> by officers."

# Visualizing as table --------------------------

chart_race<-rdaBar(
  df,
  "label",
  "detained_total_rate",
  title="Fresno PD Disproportionately Detains Latinx Males During Traffic Stops",
  subtitle="People detained during officer-initiated traffic stops by perceived race and gender (%)",
  tooltip_text=tooltip_text,
  caption=caption_text,
  export_data_label=list(pointFormat='{point.detained_total_rate:.1f}%'))
